roleset.name: exhibit general caution

role.descr: careful about, of, with regards to, etc.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: If a girl is raped , it is not her fault even if she did n't take the adequate measures to mitigate risk , because that risk would have been there irrespective of [how careful]-3 she may have been [*T*-3].

example.name: both args
example.text: Mark Twain - "*PRO* Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint."

example.name: concatenation only required if tree provides no trace
example.text: One must always be careful of books, said Tessa, and what is inside them, for words have the power to change us.
example.arg: for words have the power to change us
